30040000.text:
You're late again this time~ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lord Moon</>! Haha.
Welcome back after a while!

30040004.text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Red Don</> is handled by the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Guard Captain</>.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Go to Patrol Leader</>

30040005.text:
Is it okay if I just trust <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</>?
Ha, but for now, that's the only way...

30040006.text:
With <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> help you!
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Elder</> What do you think <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Cap</>?

30040007.text:
You must have a plan, though.
We have no choice but to trust and follow the two of you.

30040008.text:
Where is the fate of our tribe...
I miss <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Suwol Plains</>...

30040009.text:
Take care of me~!
The fate of our tribe is in our hands!

30040012.text:
The resistance of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> is stronger than I thought.
Is it time to consider reinforcements?

30040013.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Who is that small gang with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Munju</>?
I feel something strange.

30040014.text:
What the hell is a surprise reinforcement?
Huh!? Me, that one??

30040015.text:
Ugh... it's a mistake.
Hey, are you okay?

30040016.text:
I'm more worried about you than my worries.
You're bleeding all over.

30040020.text: It's an honor to be with you <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</>!

30040021.text:
How do I... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lord Moon</>?
There is a cliff in front.

30040022.text:
Um... I think it might be possible to raise it this much?
Is everyone going to be okay?

30040023.text:
Hey, that guy!! When will he grow old.
I don't think it will be of any help to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lord Moon</>...!

30040025.text: Yeah, that's right. Would you like to leave some time?

30040026.text:
Why was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The death penalty</> turned so crooked?
I was really nice when I was younger...

30040027.text:
No, are you crazy to ride that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>old razor</>?
Uhhh... how did people become like that...
